title: Mixed Learning-Based EPUB3 Content Utilization Strategies for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and experience in science education
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies of pre-service/in-service science teachers to design and utilize EPUB3-based interactive content in blended learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can produce at least three types of interactive science education content utilizing multimedia features of the EPUB3 standard
Integrate EPUB3 content into the Moodle LMS to design and implement blended (online-offline) lessons at least twice
Develop five or more EPUB3-based formative assessment activities (quizzes, simulations) for blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
